scripts.docs:dev: rm -r docs/packages/* && cp -r packages/* docs/packages/ && rm -r docs/packages/*/*.vue && vuepress dev docs
scripts.docs:deploy: vuepress build docs && cd docs/.vuepress/dist && git init && git add -A && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push -f git@github.com:zinaer/zinaer-ui-docs.git master:gh-pages
scripts.build:dist: rm -r dist/* && cp -r packages/* dist/ && rm -r dist/*/*.md
